items.name: Osa Sky Bridges & Wildlife Sanctuary
items.short_description: An immersive experience featuring elevated canopy walkways, allowing unparalleled views of the rainforest ecosystem and its inhabitants, followed by a visit to a rescue and rehabilitation center for local wildlife.

items.name: Finca Dulce Osa Cacao Experience
items.short_description: Discover the journey from bean to bar on an organic cacao farm tour, ending with a hands-on workshop where you'll make your own Costa Rican chocolate treats.
items.address: 5km East on Road to Dos Brazos, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Mangrove Glow Night Paddle
items.short_description: Paddle through the serene mangroves after sunset, witnessing the magical bioluminescence illuminate the water with every stroke. An unforgettable natural spectacle.

items.name: Osa Upcycle Art Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant community space where local artists transform discarded materials into unique artworks. Participate in workshops, browse the gallery, and learn about sustainable living.
items.address: Av. Central, Puerto Jiménez (Near main square)

items.name: Río Tigre Tubing & Cascadas Secretas
items.short_description: Float down a gentle river on an inflatable tube, surrounded by lush jungle, culminating in a short hike to stunning, secluded waterfalls perfect for a refreshing dip.
items.address: Road to La Palma, 8km from Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Serenity Osa Oasis
items.short_description: Escape to a tranquil rainforest sanctuary offering daily yoga classes, meditation sessions, and holistic treatments. Day passes available for access to facilities and a healthy lunch.

items.name: Osa Night Creatures Expedition
items.short_description: Join expert guides on a thrilling nighttime walk through the secondary forest, spotting a fascinating array of nocturnal insects, amphibians, and elusive mammals.
items.address: Near El Bambú entrance, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Mar y Tierra Sustainable Bites
items.short_description: Enjoy freshly caught, sustainable seafood and local produce in a beautiful open-air setting. Participate in a morning cooking class to learn traditional Costa Rican dishes.
items.address: Costanera Sur (near the port), Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Mirador Aves & Jardín Botánico Osa
items.short_description: Ascend a multi-story birdwatching tower for panoramic views of the forest canopy and a chance to spot rare avian species, then explore a diverse collection of native plants.
items.address: 4km on Road to Carate, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Corcovado Insights & Conservation Hub
items.short_description: A modern visitor center offering interactive exhibits about Corcovado National Park's incredible biodiversity and the ongoing conservation efforts, perfect for preparing for or reflecting on a visit.
items.address: Main Road 245, entrance to Puerto Jiménez
